Utilities class for the MessageHandler

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static java.util.ArrayList<ResQuantity> createCorrectStrongbox​(java.util.List<ResQuantity> strongbox)
    This method creates an ArrayList or resQuantity that meets the requirements for the parameter strongbox that has to be passed in DoProduction and BuyCard
    static java.util.ArrayList<Production> createProductions​(GameBoardHandler gameBoardHandler, ActionMessage actionMessage)
    This method creates a ArrayList of Production from the ActionMessage

    • Utilities

  • Method Details

    • createProductions

      public static java.util.ArrayList<Production> createProductions​(GameBoardHandler gameBoardHandler, ActionMessage actionMessage) throws InvalidActionException, MalformedMessageException
      This method creates a ArrayList of Production from the ActionMessage
      Parameters:
      gameBoardHandler - the handler of the GameBoard
      actionMessage - the message
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Production which represents the productions chosen by the player
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the productions selected are wrong
      MalformedMessageException - if the message is not well formed

    • createCorrectStrongbox

      public static java.util.ArrayList<ResQuantity> createCorrectStrongbox​(java.util.List<ResQuantity> strongbox)
      This method creates an ArrayList or resQuantity that meets the requirements for the parameter strongbox that has to be passed in DoProduction and BuyCard
      Parameters:
      strongbox - List of ResQuantity
      Returns:
      an ArrayList or ResQuantity that meets the requirements for the parameter strongbox
